name: Temple Tonic
description: A targeted blend of essential oils for quick relief from headaches and enhanced focus. Roll on temples, behind the ears, or wrists for an instant, refreshing boost.

name: Enchanted Forest Spray
description: Enchanted Forest Spritzer, a captivating blend of essential oils featuring the enchanting note of Ylang-Ylang. Elevate any space effortlessly as you spitz it as a room spray, bathroom spray, or linen spray.

name: Moonlit Blush Blend
description: Moonlit Blush Blend, a 10ml fusion of exquisite musky sweet essential oil blend, designed to create a serene atmosphere. Ideal for use in a diffuser or burner, this enchanting blend enhances your space with a delicate and calming fragrance.

name: Gift Box
description: Lunar Scents' exquisite gift box is filled with true aromatherapy treasures to take your senses on a captivating journey.
